mapper.select:
/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApOngdExtnDocDDao.selectApOngdExtnDocD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'EXTN_DOC_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.EXTN_DOC_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) EXTN_DOC_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.APV_NO, T.EXTN_DOC_TYP_CD, T.EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_CD, T.PICH_UID, T.PICH_NM, T.MAK_YY, T.SENDR_NM, T.PAGE_CNT, T.MAK_ZONE_NM, T.ORGN_APV_NO, T.REG_SEQ,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'EXTN_DOC_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.EXTN_DOC_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) EXTN_DOC_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_NM,
FROM AP_${storage}_EXTN_DOC_D T
AND T.APV_NO = #{apvNo, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND T.ORGN_APV_NO = #{orgnApvNo, jdbcType=BIGINT} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.APV_NO
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
